Package conformance.rmi

Interface TestInterface

public interface TestInterface
Simple interface for an RMI server.

This interface is used in multiple tests.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Object method​(boolean throw_exception)
    Tests transmission of arguments and returning of results.
    void rendezvous()
    Permits two threads to rendzevous with control inside the server.

  • Method Details

    • method

      java.lang.Object method​(boolean throw_exception) throws RMIException, java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Tests transmission of arguments and returning of results.
      Parameters:
      throw_exception - If true, this method throws FileNotFoundException. Otherwise, it returns null.
      Returns:
      null.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the argument is true.
      RMIException - If the call cannot be complete due to a network error.

    • rendezvous

      void rendezvous() throws RMIException
      Permits two threads to rendzevous with control inside the server.

      The first thread to call this method blocks until a second method wakes it.

      Throws:
      RMIException - If the call cannot be complete due to a network error.
